snippet.title: In Stars and Time - Accolades Trailer
snippet.description:
Happy 1-Year Anniversary! Thank You to everyone who played the game and joined us for laughs, tears, joy and friendship! We are overwhelmed by the all the positive reviews and wanted to put together a Trailer to Celebrate them. 

In Stars and Time is OUT NOW on PC, Switch, PS4, and PS5!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1677310/In_Stars_And_Time/
Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/in-stars-and-time-switch/
PlayStation 4/5: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10007419/

If you haven't played 'In Stars & Time' yet, what are you waiting for? Unless you're stuck in your own Time Loop!
